title: FYP #33 Fighting for Your Friendships
description:
We’re looking at how to prioritize friendships and hang on to our people now that we’ve found them. Here are 3 questions to ask, 2 verses to dig deeper, and 1 challenge for the weekend.

Download the book club PDF: jennieallen.com

Get a copy of Find Your People: findyourpeoplebook.com

Become one of our texties by texting the word PODCAST to 214-225-6267

Thank you, Olive&June! Get 20% off your first mani system at oliveandjune.com/madeforthis20

Here is the Tim Keller Podcast I sent to Lindsey this week: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/timothy-keller-sermons-podcast-by-gospel-in-life/id352660924?i=1000532791674
